column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Um ignore my previous review (besides the cocktail part)! Came here with a group of friends
column2: about 8 of us. As soon as we were seated
column3: our orders were taken quickly. Then came the wait. It took 30 minutes to get the starters out
column4: which is fine if they tasted good. The cornbread came out ice cold with the saltiest jam I've ever had.
